title: John Rahm shot: Spaniard holes incredible effort across a pond during Masters practice
description: Spain's Jon Rahm holes an incredible skimming shot across the pond on the 16th hole at Augusta as he practises before the Masters which begins on Thursday.

title: School laptops: Unions warn of devices shortage
description: Teaching unions say despite a push for more devices, many students still don't have access at home.

title: GCSE and A-level exams in Wales cancelled for 2021
description: Assessments done under teacher supervision will replace exams, the education minister confirms.

title: The legal challenges Trump is planning
description: The president says the result was "stolen" but his lawyers may struggle to make a strong case in court.

title: Catholic Church abuse: Cardinal Vincent Nichols criticised over leadership
description: The head of the Catholic Church in England and Wales is criticised by the child sex abuse inquiry.

title: Amazon: EU charges tech giant with breaking competition rules
description: The EU says the platform is using data on its third-party sellers to gain an unfair advantage.

title: Chester hospital baby deaths probe: Nurse Lucy Letby rearrested
description: Police are probing the deaths of 17 infants at the Countess of Chester Hospital between 2015 and 2016.

title: UK unemployment rate continues to surge
description: Redundancies rise to a record 314,000 as coronavirus continues to hit the jobs market.

title: Covid vaccine: NHS ready for Pfizer roll-out, says Matt Hancock
description: Vaccination clinics will be open seven days a week to immunise people, the health secretary says.

title: First senior England call-up for Borussia Dortmund's Bellingham
description: Borussia Dortmund's teenage midfielder Jude Bellingham is called up to the senior England squad for the first time.

title: Student Covid tests for Christmas holiday from 30 November
description: Rapid results tests for students are planned to let students get home safely in early December.

title: Remaining Women's Six Nations games cancelled, RWC qualifiers postponed
description: The three remaining matches in the Women's Six Nations have been called off and next month's World Cup qualifiers have been postponed.

title: Vietnamese Grand Prix dropped in wake of key official's arrest
description: The Vietnamese Grand Prix is dropped from the 2021 Formula 1 calendar, raising doubts that the race will ever take place.

title: Bisto and Ambrosia custard-firm Premier Foods sees Covid boost
description: The firm attracts over a million new customers as people turn to comfort foods during the pandemic.

title: Transplant a success after donated heart retrieved from LA helicopter crash
description: A hospital performs a successful transplant operation after retrieving the organ from the aircraft.

title: Covid and mental health: 'I bought a car but driving scares me'
description: People with mental health conditions can find it harder to stop spending too much online, a charity says.

title: US election: Justice lawyer quits after attorney general orders 'vote fraud' inquiries
description: Such inquiries are normally the remit of individual states but the attorney general says this is not a firm rule.

title: Scooby-Doo co-creator Ken Spears dies aged 82
description: The animator and writer was responsible for one of US TV's most-loved cartoons.

title: Spotlight on domestic abuse: How lockdown created a 'perfect storm'
description: Domestic violence is at a 15-year high in Northern Ireland as families have spent more time at home.

title: Vote for your goal of the FA Cup first round
description: Which goal of the FA Cup first round was the best?

title: Indyref2: Scottish battle lines drawn again in run-up to May's election
description: Unionists are nervous about sustaining opposition to another referendum should SNP win May's election.

title: 'The hating and rage messages just drive me to play more' - footballer-turned-gamer on competing with men
description: How an injury setback enabled footballer Lisa Manley to pursue a career as a professional gamer and her efforts to get more women involved.

title: Coronavirus doctor's diary: 'We are first-hand witnesses of this devastation'
description: Four nurses describe the pressure they are under as the second coronavirus wave gathers force.

title: Two-million-year-old skull of human 'cousin' unearthed
description: The fossil from a large-toothed species helps shed more light on how humans evolved, researchers say.

title: Lockdown children forget how to use knife and fork
description: The pandemic has seen children slipping back in learning and social skills, Ofsted inspectors warn.

title: Stacey Abrams: The woman behind Biden's biggest surprise
description: The new VP is history-making but another black woman played a pivotal role in getting Biden his win.

title: Joe Biden: How the president-elect plans to tackle climate change
description: What will a Joe Biden presidency mean for the global battle against rising temperatures?

title: Women continue to change the face of US politics
description: The US election sent a record number of women to Congress. Here's how the numbers break down.

title: Detectives and noxious locks take on bike thieves
description: The cycling industry is coming up with innovative ways to deter a wave of bike crime.

title: How Asian film is making moves to take over from Hollywood
description: As Hollywood filmmaking stalls during the pandemic, cinema's epicentre shows signs of edging East.

title: Xbox Series X: 'When gamers are ready for next-gen consoles, we're here'
description: Xbox boss Phil Spencer on launching a new console in a time of 'uncertainty for families'.

title: India Love Project: The Instagram account telling tales of 'forbidden' love
description: A new Instagram project celebrates forbidden stories of love in India.

title: Uganda election: Singer and president battle for youth vote
description: Campaigning has officially started in Uganda’s upcoming presidential elections.

title: LGBT domestic violence: 'He held me under hot water'
description: Charities supporting LGBT victims of domestic abuse say this has been their busiest year on record.
